Remote Metering Solutions (RMS) invites candidates to apply for YES Learnership Programmme for 2024.

Learnership Application Closing Date: 19 November 2024

Learnership Location: Pretoria, Sandton, Cape Town, Durban and Bloemfontein

Stipend: R3 800.00

RMS Invites unemployed graduates to apply for the YES Learnership programme 2024 for a period of 12 months. We understand that youth employment is Important for our country’s economic future, As such, RMS has collaborated with, YES for youth to create a quality work experience to enable youth to reach their full career potential.

Minimum requirements for applicants to apply:

  • Between 18 and 29 years old
  • SA ID
  • Not previous registered on a YES Learnership
  • Born in SA or naturalized before 27 April 1994
  • Must do an actual job
  • Did not work at RMS previously
  • Following Teams require YES Learner:

Following Teams requires YES Learner:

  • Bulk Supply
  • Finance
  • Contact Centre
  • Meter Reading Administration.

How to apply

All interested parties are requested to submit an updated CV to: recruitment@remotemetering.net
